Desc.entry: Christian church. Community rooms available for hire.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Sunday Services at 10.30am & 6.15pm, Mon at 9.30am (Weenies 0-3 year olds), 2.30pm (keep fit for the mature), 7pm (table tennis, see separate entry), 8pm (Wesley guild, please telephone to confirm meeting is taking place), Tues at 2.30pm (women's fellowship), 5.15pm (Rainbows and Brownies), 7.30pm (drama group, see separate entry, please telephone to confirm session is running), Wed at 7pm (karate and choir, all ages), Thurs at 7pm (table tennis), alternate Thurs (ladies guild)
